shared.noSharedDescription: When someone shares a project with you via a sharing link, it will automatically appear here.

starred.noStarredDescription: Star your favorite projects for quick access. Click the star icon on a project card to pin it here.

landing.landingDescription: Describe what you want, and we'll build it. From idea to deployed app in minutes — no coding required.

pricing.pricingDescription: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.
pricing.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our
pricing.compareDetailDesc: See exactly what you get with each plan
pricing.faqLimitsTitle: What are the limits on the Free plan?
pricing.faqLimitsAnswer: The Free plan includes 20 AI messages per day, up to 3 active projects, 1 GB of storage, and access to basic AI models. It's perfect for getting started and exploring the platform. There are no time limits — the Free plan is free forever.
pricing.faqUpgradeTitle: How do I upgrade my plan?
pricing.faqUpgradeAnswer: You can upgrade anytime from your billing settings or by clicking the upgrade button in the app. When you upgrade, you instantly get access to all the features of your new plan. We prorate for the remainder of your current billing period.
pricing.faqCancelTitle: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
pricing.faqCancelAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. When you cancel, your plan stays active until the end of your current billing period. After that, your account will switch to the Free plan. You won't lose any of your projects, but you may lose access to premium features.
pricing.faqBillingTitle: How does the billing cycle work?
pricing.faqBillingAnswer: Billing cycles start the day you subscribe. For monthly plans, you are billed on the same date each month. For annual plans, you are billed once a year. You will receive an invoice via email for each payment. All prices are in USD.
pricing.faqTeamTitle: How many team members can I add on the Team plan?
pricing.faqTeamAnswer: The Team plan supports up to 25 team members. Each member gets their own account with full access to shared projects. You can manage roles and permissions from the admin dashboard. Need more seats? Contact our sales team for a custom Enterprise plan.
pricing.faqApiTitle: Can I use my own API keys?
pricing.faqApiAnswer: Currently, all AI requests go through our platform to ensure security, rate limiting, and usage tracking. We are exploring a bring-your-own-key option for Team and Enterprise plans. Sign up for our waitlist to be notified when this feature launches.
pricing.faqEnterpriseAnswer: Yes! For organizations that need more than what the Team plan offers, we provide custom Enterprise plans with unlimited seats, dedicated infrastructure, custom SLAs, SSO integration, on-premise deployment options, and a dedicated account manager. Contact our sales team to discuss your needs.
pricing.faqStudentTitle: Are there student or education discounts?
pricing.faqStudentAnswer: Yes, we offer 50% off the Pro plan for verified students and educators. You need to verify your status through our education verification partner. The discount applies for the duration of your enrollment or teaching period. Apply through your account settings.

settings.workspaceDescription: Workspaces allow you to collaborate on projects in real time.
settings.setAvatarDesc: Set an avatar for your workspace.
settings.name: Name
settings.nameDesc: Your full workspace name, as visible to others.
settings.usernameDesc: Set a username for the workspace profile page.
settings.defaultMonthlyCreditLimit: Default monthly credit limit for members
settings.creditLimitDesc: Default monthly credit limit for members of this workspace. Leave blank for no limit.
settings.leaveWorkspaceDesc: You cannot leave your last workspace. Your account must be a member of at least one workspace.
settings.invitingPeople: Inviting people to {name}'s AppMake gives access to workspace-shared projects and credits. You have 1 builder in this workspace.
settings.plansDesc: Manage your subscription and credit balance.
settings.planProDesc: Designed for fast-moving teams building together in real time.
settings.planBusinessDesc: Advanced controls and power features for growing departments.
settings.planEnterpriseDesc: Built for large organizations that need flexibility, scale, and governance.
settings.cloudAndAIDesc: All plans include free monthly usage. For increased Cloud and AI usage, you can top up on paid plans.
settings.upgradeToTopUp: Upgrade to top up your balance ($0).
settings.temporaryOffering: This is a temporary offering until early 2026 while we refine our pricing model.
settings.privacyDesc: Manage privacy and security settings for your workspace.
settings.defaultProjectVisibilityDesc: Choose whether new projects start as public, private (workspace only), or drafts.
settings.defaultWebsiteAccessDesc: Choose whether new published websites are public or only accessible to signed-in workspace members.
settings.mcpServersDesc: Allow workspace members to use MCP servers.
settings.dataCollectionDesc: Opt out of data collection for this workspace.
settings.restrictWorkspaceInvitationsDesc: When enabled, only admins and owners can invite members to this workspace.
settings.whoCanPublishDesc: Control who can publish and deploy projects to the web.
settings.allowPublicPreviewDesc: When enabled, users can create temporary public preview links to their apps. When disabled, preview link creation is blocked.
settings.crossProjectDesc: Allow projects in this workspace to read files from other projects.
settings.accountSettingsDesc: Customize how others see and interact with you on AppMake.

settings.chatSuggestionsDesc: Show helpful suggestions in the chat interface to improve your experience.
settings.generationSoundDesc: Plays a satisfying sound notification when a generation is complete.
settings.autoAcceptDesc: Automatically join workspaces and projects when invited instead of requiring manual acceptance.
settings.pushNotificationsDesc: Enable push notifications in the mobile app to customize these settings.
settings.twoFactorDesc: Secure your account with a one-time code via an authenticator app or SMS.
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your AppMake account. This cannot be undone.
settings.labsDesc: These are experimental features that may be changed or removed.
settings.githubBranchDesc: Select the branch you want to edit in your GitHub repository.
settings.connectorsDesc: Extend your apps with powerful integrations and services.
settings.sharedConnectorsDesc: Add functionality to your apps. Configured once by admins, available to everyone in your workspace.
